step.cmd: Enter the name of the tier in which you would like to search in the Tier name field.
Choose an Expression Type using the context menu.
Enter the expression you would like to search for in the Expression field.
Choose whether or not your query should be Case sensitive and/or an Exact match using the check boxes.

stepresult.note: Case sensitive is not applicable to Phonex, Stress pattern, or CGV pattern expressions.
